entry.title: Forum has moved
entry.content: Attention! Forum has moved to http://instead-games.ru/forum Please, update your bookmarks. ;) See ya!

entry.title: Screenshots
entry.content: Currently, there are a lot of games written with INSTEAD. Most of them are Russians only, but some are translated to other languages.

entry.title: Contact
entry.content: Donations You may transfer some money for hosting. Thank you!

entry.title: About
entry.content: About INSTEAD was designed to make the textographic games. This games are mix of interactive ficrtion, visual novels and classic point & click adventures.

entry.title: Download
entry.content: Download Version 3.2.1 Installer for Windows (.exe file) Archive for Windows (unpack and run) PPA repository for Ubuntu OS X Sources Others

entry.title: Where are the articles?
entry.content: Currently, they are in Russian only…

entry.title: Documentation
entry.content: Documentation To make the game you need text editor with UTF-8 support (without BOM). Documentation already included in INSTEAD (doc/ directory).

entry.title: How to download and run game?
entry.content: Where to get? You can find games here: Some games on itch instead-games.ru repository How to run? Manually You can download zip or idf file and select it from the INSTEAD menu.
